attributes.action: keep the exisitng Norwich city boundaries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Norwich wishes to have unitary local government, but it has been told that this will only be considered if the city doubles in size from 125,000 to 250,000 people. This can only be achieved by taking over nearby villages and other communities. 
The Boundary Commission will consider this proposal. They have to take account of public opinion. Signing this petition is one way of expressing your view

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "keep the exisitng Norwich city boundaries."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16890


Prime Minister's Office
